alert.note: Alert for Carson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 6:40PM CDT until July 29 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 639 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Fritch, or 12 miles northwest of Panhandle, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Carson County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
